      • deepFindClosestItem

        public final MapItem deepFindClosestItem(GeoPoint location,
                                         double threshold,
                                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> metadata)
        Description copied from interface: DeepMapItemQuery
        Finds the closest MapItem to the specified point, that falls within the specified threshold.
        Specified by:
        deepFindClosestItem in interface DeepMapItemQuery
        Overrides:
        deepFindClosestItem in class MapGroup
        Parameters:
        location - The location
        threshold - The search threshold, in meters. Only items that are within this distance from the point are considered. If no threshold is desired, the value 0.0d should be specified.
        metadata - Extra query metadata
        Returns:
        Closest map item or null if none found

      • removeGroupImpl

        public final boolean removeGroupImpl(MapGroup group,
                                     boolean referenceOnly)
        Description copied from class: DefaultMapGroup
        Remove a MapGroup if it belongs to this one ;
        Overrides:
        removeGroupImpl in class DefaultMapGroup
        Parameters:
        group - the MapGroup to remove
        referenceOnly - If true only references to the group should be removed. This will be the common case when the remove is effected by adding the child to another group. If false it is assumed that the group is being disposed of.
        Returns:
        true if group belonged and was removed
